{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Archer C2700 US 1.0 02.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AC2600 MU-MIMO Wi-Fi Router |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/us/products/details/Archer-C2700.html |sp = https://www.tp-link.com/en/support/download/Archer-C2700/ |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = TP-LINK_Archer_C2700_v1.x |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Archer C2700 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = v1.x |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = Archer C2700 |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C2700 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PXB4395EL;S7423N09, SLMD9; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = MIPS 34Kc |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 800 <!-- 600 / 800 MHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = ESMT;F59L1G81MA-25T; |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B2G1646F-BYMA; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0, |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3.3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wave2, MU-MIMO, Alexa, IFTTT, antivirus, |addchip = 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85408-11;85408-11, 4692050.1, 1813 MX;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = TP-Link_XXXX, TP-Link_XXXX_5G |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = End of Life |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 12/13/2018 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = 170 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83524M;S7054L37, SLLQJ; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 1733 |rad1n = 600 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Intel (Lantiq);PSB83514M;S7014L27, SLLVP; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Web GUI: http://tplinkwifi.net
